title: Letters from the Vieux Carré
description: Can love return what death has taken away?Grief stricken, Anna wanders the French Quarter of New Orleans. After encountering a strange disembodied chant, she is sent falling back in time and into the arms of a man who bears an uncanny resemblance to her deceased fiancée. Confused by her uncontrollable desire for Gabriel, and feeling utterly alone, Anna begins writing letters to her mother, letters to be delivered over one hundred and fifty years later!
author: Haden Hudson
